ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: Date when the designation was granted.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifier for the designation, or procedure number.

ivardefs.name: intendedUse
ivardefs.desc: The intended use of the product, e.g. prevention, treatment.

ivardefs.name: species
ivardefs.desc: Animal species for which this applies.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: For example granted, pending, expired or withdrawn.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The type of special designation, e.g. orphan drug, minor use.

properties.desc: Indicates if the medicinal product has an orphan designation for the treatment of a rare disease.
